data.text: @vickdiesel1 Hola Vick, is your flight 24 hours from now? please let us know by DM. Thank you.
@ccd9pem Hola Philip, you should contact with the authorities of the USA to confirm the requirements. Regards,

@daskomp Regarding the incident involving your luggage, can you confirm if you filed a claim at the airport? Do you have a PIR code? Please send us all the information by DM to review. Regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa 2/

data.text: @stirling19991 Hola, si tu guitarra no excede los 30x120x38 cm podrás llevarla en cabina como única pieza de equipaje de mano permitido además del accesorio personal. Para más detalles visita nuestra web https://t.co/50MLANzDWt . Saludos.

@LouHugh94144201 We're sorry to read your comments, Lou. From this department we are following up on your case and we will notify you as soon as we have any update. We appreciate your understanding. Regards.
@perlalessandra Hola Perla, hemos respondido a tus DMs. Saludos.
@truly_missmandy Thanks Mandy, we proceed to review your direct messages. Regards.

@truly_missmandy Hola Mandy, how can we help you? To review the status of your case please send us a direct message with your full name and PIR code. Regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, we confirm that we have recently requested an update on the status of your baggage from the department in charge. We will notify you by this means as soon as we have an answer. We appreciate your patience. Regards.

data.text:
@daskomp Hola Alex, we don't know the details of the incident, please send us all the information by DM to review your case and tell you how to proceed. Kind regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@alawiwsm09 Ali, we appreciate your patience. Our colleagues will notify you via email in case of any match with a found object. From this department we remain at your disposal in case of any doubt during the process. Kind regards.

@MichaelaPetty9 Please send us all the details by DM. Regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa 2/

@MichaelaPetty9 Hola Michaela, we understand that your luggage is in the process of being delivered. Can you confirm if you have contacted our colleagues in the baggage department for assistance or an update on the status of the baggage?. 1/

@diiijaaaaa Hola, how can we help you? Please send us a direct message with the details of the management you want to carry out. We will review and tell you how to proceed. Regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@alawiwsm09 Ali, we confirm that we have reviewed the status of the case, however, we have not yet reported any update or match with a found object. We appreciate your patience and ask you to contact us again by this means to check again. Regards.

@BrendaJ7777 Hola Brenda, we do not know the details of the incident. Let us know by DM if there is anything we can help you with from this department. Kind regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@alawiwsm09 Ali, could you send us a direct message with the file number associated with your claim?. Regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

urls.title: Iberia's platform to recover your lost belongings
urls.description: Everything lost can be found. Foundspot is a free service connecting people who have lost items or pets with the people who have found it.

data.text: @cheunghk5 Cheung, we have responded to your direct messages. Let us know in case of any doubt. Regards.

@kristaleighhhh Krista, please send us your reservation code and full name by DM. We will check if seat selection is enabled. Regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@PC53725937 Hola, we would like to have more information about the incident. Please DM us your full name and PIR code to review. Kind regards
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@kristaleighhhh In some cases, you must be at check-in time (between 24 and 2 hours before the flight) to select seats. Kind regards.
https://t.co/0Kf2bPGDPV 2/
@kristaleighhhh Hola Krista, we inform you that if you made the purchase with another company, you must request the corresponding code to access through our website and manage your reservation. I 1/
@cheunghk5 Hola Cheung, we proceed to review your direct messages. Kind regards.

@R_HarringtonNJ Hola, we inform you that if you have purchased your reservation from an agency you must contact them directly to request the desired management since it is not issued from our system we will not be able to review the corresponding data. Regards.

@CelinesToribio Hola Celines, we have reviewed your consultation privately and we have provided you with information to follow up on your cases. For our part we are attentive to your comments, regards.

@perlalessandra Hola Perla, desconocemos los detalles puntuales de lo ocurrido en tu vuelo, puedes indicarnos más en un MP así como confirmarnos en donde solicitaste el menú especial ¿constaba en tu gestión de reservas? Saludos

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @donor_whisperer Hola Rachel, we are sorry for all the inconveniences, in case your friend has not had a good experience, if she wishes she should be able to open a claim in our web form: https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG once they review it our colleagues must give her an answer, regards.

@donor_whisperer Hola Rachel. Could you please, provide us with her booking code via DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa), email address, and her name as it appears on the booking, and ticket numbers so that we can review it? Regards.
@BreifniF Hola. We have replied to your DM's. Regards.

@campspeter Hola Peter. We're sorry to read this. Could you please, provide us with your PIR code and full name as registered on your booking via DM ((https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa)) so that we can review it? Regards.
@Itzjr0d Hola Jess. We have replied to your DM. Regards.
@BreifniF Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DMs. Please check
@MmeNdiayeUK You're welcome :)
@Itzjr0d We have your claim reference in our private chat, Jess. So we don't need to ask for it again :)

@MmeNdiayeUK Hola Alice, it looks like there is a problem in our website, because we checked your booking information in our system and your tickets don't include checked luggage. We've replied your DMs

@EloisaC67013488 We're glad to read this, Eloisa. Sorry for the inconvenience. After the delivery process has been initiated and the SMS sent, the courier company is responsible for the bag's delivery and, depending on how many bags they have, the process might take a few days. Apologies
@MichaelaPetty9 You're welcome, Michaela. We remain at your disposal

domain.name: News Vertical
domain.description: News Categories like Entertainment or Technology

data.text: @MichaelaPetty9 If you don't receive any news within 24h, please get back to us via DM. Sory for the inconvenience

@MichaelaPetty9 Hola Michaela, unfortunately, our baggage center needs to wait for a confirmation from the airport agents that the bag has arrived and the delivery process was initiated. According to the tracing system, the delivery has been initiated. /1
@EloisaC67013488 We kindly ask you to wait for a new update via SMS or email. Best regards

@EloisaC67013488 Sorry for the inconvenience, Eloisa. Notice that the SMS begins with ''Salvo incidencias'', which means something like ''in principle / if there isn't any mistake'' . In some cases, unfortunately, there isn't enough room on the flight that the bag was scheduled to fly on. /1
@Itzjr0d Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. We'll contact the claims department and inform them that you still haven't received the check. Kind regards
@diosadeamourr Hola, we've just replied your DM. Please check

@CelinesToribio Hola Celinés, we're sorry for the inconvenience and would like to offer our sincerest apologies. Could you please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, ticket number (075...) and the references related to the seat selection payments (07555...) https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

urls.title: Customer service | Iberia Express
urls.description: Get to know how to contact our Customer Service for purchase, changes and refunds.

data.text: @rahul172020 Hola, Rahul. We're not sure what you mean by ''Express flight''. Did you book the tickets with Iberia Express (https://t.co/nwkYty9Pf1)? If so, you need to consult them directly: https://t.co/UsQRNtkkn3 , as we only handle Iberia tickets, not Iberia Express :)

@customerpower2 Only the claims department will be able to assist you with your claim. That's why you need to fill out the online form, attach the required documents and wait for their answer by email, which might take up to 7 business days. Sorry for the inconvenience

data.text: @jess_finigan Sorry, Jess. Since your Iberia flights were marketed with British Airways' flight number, the seat selection will only be available at the airport on the day of your flight. Regards
@Sporthub365 Hola, we've just replied your DM. Please get back to us with the required info and the other booking reference

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @customerpower2 Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. In order to submit a formal complaint, please use our online form and attach the police report, along with a list of the missing objects and their values. If an 'error' pops up, please keep clicking on ''continue'' https://t.co/va7wYIeka5
@jess_finigan You're welcome :)
@jess_finigan Hola Jess, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@CorrineDeCiampa Hola Corrine, sorry for the inconvenience. We've just replied your DM. Please check

@CE0031 Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, ticket number, full name and claim reference. If the ticket was issued by Iberia Express and you filed the claim with them, you need to follow up directly with IB Express https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@AnaMerinoPoeta Hola, Ana. Es que es el procedimiento correcto. Lo que puedes hacer, si quieres, es abrirla y cuando la tengas, nos envías por mensaje privado los datos para revisarla con nuestros compañeros. Gracias. Un saludo

@LouHugh94144201 @KendryDaisy Hola Daissy, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your PIR code and full passenger to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@AnaMerinoPoeta Hola Ana, para que el área responsable pueda gestionar lo correspondiente por la demora sufrida, la vía para hacerlo, es a través de formulario web. Saludos
@MalcolmStewart4 You're welcome Malcolm. Regard :)

@MalcolmStewart4 Hola Malcom, In line with the current regulations, the use of a surgical mask or one providing greater protection (without an exhalation valve), covering the nose and mouth, is compulsory for everyone aged six and over when boarding the plane and throughout the flight. Regards
@bhatrina_patel Hello, we have responded to your comments by private message, we have requested additional information by that means to assist you. We look forward to your response, regards.
@omars1234 Hello, we have reviewed your query and we have provided you with more information by DM. We remain attentive to your comments and we are at your disposal, regards.
@LuisStein sí has tenido gastos de primera necesidad, sugerimos conservar facturas originales, una vez se recupere la pieza podrán enviarse esos detalles para el estudio de reembolso. Saludos /2

@LuisStein Hola Luis, en el expediente SCLIB58277 - STEIN LA BÚSQUEDA CONTINÚA, tal como podrás confirmar ingresando a https://t.co/Q7a9hQxaln
con el PIR y apellido, una vez se tengan novedades se te contactará directamente con la información ingresada en el reclamo /1
@LouHugh94144201 Hola, we have sent you more information through our direct message conversation. Kind regards.
@SilviaTorresss We have answered to your message in Spanish, Silvia. Regards
@LuisStein Hola Luis, ¿Podrías darnos más detalles sobre tu caso por MD, por favor? Saludos.
@Bor_Zanon Hola, we have sent a response to your DM requesting some details to be able to follow up on your case from here. Kind regards.
@campspeter Hola Peter, please send us more details about your case via DM so we can verify all the information. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Tony79091545 Hola, we have sent you a response again in our conversation by DM. Kind regards.
@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, we've sent you a DM a few hours ago. Could you please check and provide the required information?
@Yeliz30170546 Sure. We'll contact the claims department and get back to you via DM as soon as we have an update. Regards
@Yeliz30170546 We kindly ask you to please wait for an answer from the claims department, which might take up to 7 business days to get back to you by email. Kind regards
@Yeliz30170546 then choose any other option and use the text box to inform your original claim code and provide additional infos explaining exactly what you need. Regards

data.text: @Yeliz30170546 We're sorry to read this. If you wish to appeal and have the case reviewed by our colleagues, you need to use the same online form https://t.co/pVVvyg1YzT. Select  ‘assistance’ as complaint reason,/1
@mr_boatshoes Sorry to read this. We've sent you a new DM. Please check
@wiltshiremike1 We've just replied it. Please check
@CarolinaZang Hola Carolina. Sorry for the inconvenience. We've replied your DMs
@pdugar Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, booking code, ticket number and more details about your query https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

data.text: @Valentina_Gald We're still unable to reply the DMs sent to our other profile (https://t.co/8aghZgUS8W). Are you sure that you started following the profile Iberia (https://t.co/8aghZgUS8W) and not the iberia_en?

urls.title: Iberia (@Iberia) / Twitter
urls.description: A tu servicio 24 horas, 365 días al año. Política de privacidad: https://t.co/vPnCenkhwI…

data.text: @Valentina_Gald Hola Valentina, we're trying to reply to your DMs sent to our main profile, but it looks like you don't follow us. Please start following our main profile (https://t.co/8aghZgUS8W) , so we can answer your DMs
@Valentina_Gald Sorry for the inconvenience, Valentina. Please send us a DM with your full name and PIR reference number https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@kwagenveld Thanks for the feedback. We'll contact the relevant department and ask them to double check and correct the information, in case needed. Kind regards
@Yeliz30170546 The case has been escalated many times since june and the answer is always the same: only a 180GBP compensation applies in your case. Sorry

@Yeliz30170546 Hola, as we understand, the compensation was always 180GBP and the 280GBP informed by email was actually a typo. Since the beginning, the information is that you should receive 180GBP, but there's only one email stating that it should be 280GBP. Sorry for the mistake

urls.title: Travel restrictions due to COVID-19
urls.description: Check the regulations, requirements and restrictions for travel established by the different countries. Plan your flight ensuring that you meet all the requirements to make your international trip.

data.text: @kwagenveld certificate, there's no need to fill this out, as pointed out at our website https://t.co/tAXgHHMe2O . Kind regards

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @kwagenveld Hola, according to the information we have, all passengers that don't have an EU  Digital Covid certificate (or equivalent) and aren't transiting internationally must fill out the spanish health form and generate the QR code. If you have the EU Covid /1

@LouHugh94144201 @wiltshiremike1 Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with the bag's content list, so we can forward it to the baggage center to help with the searches https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@LouHugh94144201 Thanks, Lou. We've just replied it
@sarahlaclau You're welcome, Sarah
@andrelereveur You're welcome, Andre

@LouHugh94144201 When a similar bag is located, the airport agents run it through a x-ray scan in order to confirm if the bag is really yours. That's why we need the content list. Have you sent it via DM? When was it?
@sarahlaclau Hola Sarah, sorry for the inconvenience. We'll contact the relevant department and ask them to move on with your claim. Best regards
@getmyswagga Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with the bag's content list, so we can send it to the relevant department to help them with the searches https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@EmRussellChile Hola Emily, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number, registered email and all details of your inquiry? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
